title: Bloomberg's Sink on the Melania Trump Speech Controversy(Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Sink on the Melania Trump Speech Controversy(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Justin Sink, Government reporter for Bloomberg News, reporting live from the RNC in Cleveland, on the Melania Trump speech controversy.
